titles.title: A bill to amend the Land and Water Conservation Fund Act of 1965, as amended, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands.

bill.summary: 12/18/1987--Introduced. Title I: Amendment to Land and Water Conservation Fund Act - Amends the Land and Water Conservation Fund Act of 1965 to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to charge and collect recreation use fees for specialized recreation sites, services, or facilities and for areas where services and facilities are provided to accommodate heavy public use. Gives a 50 percent discount to Golden Age Passport holders. Title II: National Forest System Recreation Use Fee Expenditures - Places recreation receipts in a special Treasury fund for recreation area operation and rehabilitation. Authorizes the contracting out or use of volunteers for recreation use fee collection. Authorizes the Secretary to accept donations to defray recreation program costs within the National Forest System.
